H0.text: Which late MP owned Saltwood Castle in Kent. Enoch Powell

H1.text: Which late MP owned Saltwood Castle in Kent. Michael Heseltine

H2.text: Which late MP owned Saltwood Castle in Kent. Norman Tebbit

H3.text: Which late MP owned Saltwood Castle in Kent. Alan Clarke

A4.text: The castle became the home of his son, the politician and diarist, Alan Clark.

A5.text: The castle was purchased in 1955 by Kenneth Clark, whose son Alan Clark subsequently lived there.
